description: The update information for the treatment plan.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number that corresponds to each update of the treatment plan in this row.

columns.name: UPDATED_BY_USER_ID
columns.description: The user ID of the person who performed an update of the treatment plan in this row.

columns.name: UPDATED_ON_TM
columns.description: The date/time in external format of an update to the treatment plan in this row.

columns.name: UPDATED_IN_PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: Stores the contact serial number (CSN) of a patient visit in which this plan was updated and saved. This item is empty if the update occurred outside of an encounter context.
